name: casablanca 12" square
notes:
> this pattern is available for **[**free on
> my blog**][1]**. the downloadable pdf
> listed here for sale contains the full
> pattern, in one printable file without
> advertisements.

this is a fun square with overlay crochet to create the 3d effect, but don't worry, i have lots of photos to help you through. this square would be great in combination with others for an afghan or bedspread, but if you aren't feeling inspired for such a large project, try two of them together to make a throw pillow! 



designed in worsted weight yarn



my patterns are written in standard american terms and include pictures, stitch guides and explanations, as necessary, to make them easy to follow.

please share your finished projects on our facebook page and join us for info, coupon codes and giveaways. **[www.facebook.com/patternparadise][2]**

follow my blog: **[www.pattern-paradise.com][3]**
